opinion.posture: Proceedings under Post Conviction Hearing Act. Order entered denying petition, order by REILLY, J. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 380, April T., 1978, from Court of Common Pleas, of Clearfield County, No. 76-443-CRA. Submitted October 26, 1978.
opinion.attorneys: Benjamin Spencer Blakley, III, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant; Barbara H. Schickling, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PRICE, HESTER and WATKINS, JJ.
